package.description: This package contains a recent version of the osgOcean library (http://code.google.com/p/osgocean/). This ROS package does not intend to modify osgOcean in any way, it simply provides a convenient way to download and compile the library, because osgOcean is not available from an OS package manager. However, this package might contain some temporary patches to osgOcean while they are being applied upstream, or while a permanent fix for a problem is being discussed by the osgOcean community.
